title: Cross-Platform JavaScript Stealer Targets Crypto Wallets in New Lazarus Group Campaign
description: The North Korea-linked Lazarus Group has been linked to an active campaign that leverages fake LinkedIn job offers in the cryptocurrency and travel sectors to deliver malware capable of infecting Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems.
